text: “Ndipo pamene Mûsa adabwerera kwa anthu ake ali wokwiya, wodandaula (pomva zomwe zidachitikazo), adati: “Umlowam’malo wanu womwe mudandichitira pambuyo panga, ngoipa zedi. Kodi mudalifulumilira lamulo la Mbuye wanu; (mudachita zanuzanu musanadziwe chimene angakulamulireni Mulungu wanu)? Ndipo adawaponya pansi mapalewo (momwe mudalembedwa malamulo a chipembedzo chake). Nagwira mutu wa M’bale wake nkuukokera kwa iye. (kufuna kummenya chifukwa cha mkwiyo umene adali nawo. M’bale wakeyo) adati: “E iwe mwana wa mayi anga! Ndithu anthu (awa) adandiyesa wofooka, potero (sadamvere malangizo anga). Adatsala pang’ono kundipha. Choncho usawakondweretse adani (ndi chilango chako) pa ine, ndipo usandiike pamodzi ndi anthu oipa.”
